reviews.subject: Introduction to Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson is very knowledgeable and passionate about psychology. The lectures are engaging, but the assignments can be quite challenging.

reviews.subject: Organic Chemistry
reviews.review: Prof. Smith is a decent instructor but sometimes struggles to explain complex concepts clearly. The class can be difficult if you're not familiar with the subject.

reviews.subject: Advanced Calculus
reviews.review: Dr. Brown is an exceptional teacher with a deep understanding of calculus. Her lectures are clear, and she provides great support outside of class.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Computer Science
reviews.review: Prof. Lee makes programming accessible and enjoyable. The course material is well-organized, though the workload can be heavy at times.

reviews.subject: Modern History
reviews.review: Dr. Davis's lectures are often disorganized, and her grading can be inconsistent. The subject matter is interesting, but the teaching could be improved.

reviews.subject: Economics 101
reviews.review: Prof. Martinez provides a basic understanding of economics. The classes are straightforward, but there's a lack of depth in the material covered.

reviews.subject: Biology of Cells
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson is fantastic! She explains complex biological processes with ease and enthusiasm. The lab sessions are particularly valuable.

reviews.subject: World Literature
reviews.review: Prof. Garcia is very engaging and knowledgeable about literature. The course discussions are thought-provoking, though the reading list is extensive.

reviews.subject: Statistics for Social Sciences
reviews.review: Dr. Robinson does a good job with the basics of statistics, but the class can get repetitive. The problem sets are helpful for practice.

reviews.subject: Intro to Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Clark is brilliant and stimulates great discussions. The course challenges you to think critically and engage with complex ideas.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Lewis is passionate about the environment and integrates real-world issues into the curriculum. The class is interactive and thought-provoking.

reviews.subject: Financial Accounting
reviews.review: Prof. Walker's teaching style is dry, and he doesn't make the material very engaging. The course is essential but could be improved with better delivery.

reviews.subject: Artificial Intelligence
reviews.review: Dr. Hall is an expert in AI and provides insightful lectures and hands-on projects. The course is challenging but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Macroeconomics
reviews.review: Prof. Allen covers the basics well, but the lectures can be monotonous. The material is important but presented in a somewhat dull manner.

reviews.subject: Genetics
reviews.review: Dr. Young is very knowledgeable and makes genetics accessible. The labs are very useful, though the exams can be quite tough.

reviews.subject: Human Anatomy
reviews.review: Prof. Hernandez provides clear explanations and uses practical examples. The course is demanding but offers a comprehensive understanding of anatomy.

reviews.subject: Public Speaking
reviews.review: Dr. King is an excellent instructor who helps students build confidence. The course is interactive and provides valuable skills for effective communication.

reviews.subject: Database Management
reviews.review: Prof. Thompson covers the material adequately but lacks enthusiasm. The practical exercises are useful, though the lectures can be dry.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Dr. Roberts is incredibly knowledgeable and passionate. Her teaching makes complex neuroscience topics engaging and understandable.

reviews.subject: Creative Writing
reviews.review: Prof. White is inspiring and provides excellent feedback. The course fosters creativity and helps improve writing skills.

reviews.subject: Microeconomics
reviews.review: Dr. Harris presents the material clearly but doesn't always address practical applications. The course is solid but could use more real-world examples.

reviews.subject: Calculus II
reviews.review: Prof. Moore is an exceptional teacher who makes difficult topics more manageable. His enthusiasm and clear explanations are very helpful.
